variant.name: Baseline
variant.summary: every 2 minutes regardless of CPU threshold

variant.name: Delayed
variant.summary: 1 minute after the CPU threshold is reached

variant.name: Immediate
variant.summary: when the CPU threshold is reached

histogram.name: CPU.Experimental.EstimatedFrequencyAsPercentOfLimit
histogram.summary:
The CPU frequency as a percentage of the estimated current frequency (see base::EstimateCpuFrequency) over the max frequency of the fastest CPU, as reported by base::GetCpuMhzLimit.
Recorded every 5 minutes. Windows x86 only.

histogram.name: CPU.Experimental.EstimatedFrequencyAsPercentOfMax
histogram.summary:
The CPU frequency as a percentage of the estimated current frequency (see base::EstimateCpuFrequency) over the max frequency of the fastest CPU, as reported by base::GetCpuMaxMhz.
Recorded every 5 minutes. Windows x86 only.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.CPUMonitorMemoryUse.{ResourceContextType}.{ResourceContextState}
histogram.summary: The estimated size of CPUMeasurementMonitor's result cache. Recorded at the same time as the Memory.Browser.PrivateMemoryFootprint. This slice is the memory used to store {ResourceContextType} that are {ResourceContextState}.

variant.name: Dead
variant.summary: associated with a resource that no longer exists

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.Experimental.AccessibilityModeFlag
histogram.summary: Whether individual accessibility mode flags are set. Recorded with every UMA report to attempt to slice other metrics based on which a11y flags are set.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.Experimental.HasAccessibilityModeFlag
histogram.summary: Whether any accessibility mode flags are set. Recorded with every UMA report to attempt to slice other metrics based on whether a11y is active.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.AverageBackgroundCPU.{Timing}
histogram.summary: Recorded {Timing}, this histogram represents the average CPU usage of each background tab.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.AverageForegroundCPU.{Timing}
histogram.summary: Recorded {Timing}, this histogram represents the average CPU usage of each foreground (active, playing audio, etc) tab.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.BackgroundTabsToGetUnderCPUThreshold.{Timing}
histogram.summary: Recorded {Timing}, this histogram represents the lowest number of background tabs that would need to be closed to get CPU usage under the threshold.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.DurationOverThreshold
histogram.summary: Recorded when a device drops back below the CPU threshold, this histogram represents the total time that the device was above the threshold.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.NonChrome.{Timing}
histogram.summary: Recorded {Timing}, with the percentage of CPU used by non-Chrome processes on the system over the past 2 minutes. This is calculated from other PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.* histograms: NonChrome = System - (TotalBackgroundCPU + TotalForegroundCPU).

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.System.{Timing}
histogram.summary: Recorded {Timing}, with the percentage of CPU used by all processes on the system over the past 2 minutes.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.SystemCPUError.{Timing}
histogram.summary: Recorded {Timing} when an error occurs measuring the system CPU usage. Successful measurements are recorded in PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.System.*.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.TopNBackgroundCPU.{N}.{Timing}
histogram.summary: Recorded {Timing}, this histogram represents the sum of CPU capacity being used by the top {N} background tabs.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.TotalBackgroundCPU.{Timing}
histogram.summary: Recorded {Timing}, this histogram represents the percent of CPU capacity being used by background tabs.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.TotalBackgroundTabCount.{Timing}
histogram.summary: Recorded {Timing}, this histogram represents the number of background tabs.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.TotalForegroundCPU.{Timing}
histogram.summary: Recorded {Timing}, this histogram represents the percent of CPU capacity being used by foreground (active, playing audio, etc) tabs.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.PerformanceInterventions.CPU.TotalForegroundTabCount.{Timing}
histogram.summary: Recorded {Timing}, this histogram represents the number of foreground (active, playing audio, etc) tabs.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.SiteDB.DatabaseInit
histogram.summary: The result of opening the Local Site Characteristics database. Recorded at startup when the database gets opened. If the result is not Success, PerformanceManager.SiteDB.DatabaseInitAfterRepair may be logged as well.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.SiteDB.DatabaseInitAfterDelete
histogram.summary: The result of opening the Local Site Characteristics database after deleting it after a failed repair attempt. Recorded at startup when the database gets opened, if the initial open and repair attempts failed.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.SiteDB.DatabaseInitAfterRepair
histogram.summary: The result of opening the Local Site Characteristics database after a repair attempt. Recorded at startup when the database gets opened, if the initial open attempt failed. If the result is not Success, PerformanceManager.SiteDB.DatabaseInitAfterDelete may be logged as well.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.SiteDB.DatabaseRepair
histogram.summary: The result of trying to repair the Local Site Characteristics database after a failed open. Recorded at startup when the database gets opened, if the initial open attempt failed.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.SiteDB.ObservationTimeBeforeFirstUse.{Feature}
histogram.summary: The cumulative observation time before the {Feature} feature tracked in the Local Site Characteristics database gets used. Reported the first time a site is observed to use the feature.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.SiteDB.OnDiskSize
histogram.summary: The size of the Local Site Characteristics database on disk. Recorded at startup when the database gets opened, if it already existed from a previous run.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.SiteDB.ReadHasCompletedBeforeQuery
histogram.summary: Boolean indicating if the read operation from the Local Site Characteristics database has completed when we query for the characteristics of a site. Reported every time the database is queried.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.SiteDB.WriteCompleted.{SiteDBWriteTrigger}
histogram.summary: Logged when a write to the Local Site Characteristics database finishes, if the write was scheduled by a call to {SiteDBWriteTrigger}. The count of this should match PerformanceManager.SiteDB.WriteScheduled.{SiteDBWriteTrigger}, otherwise writes are being lost.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.SiteDB.WriteScheduled.{SiteDBWriteTrigger}
histogram.summary: Logged whenever a write to the Local Site Characteristics database is scheduled by a call to {SiteDBWriteTrigger}. The count of this should match PerformanceManager.SiteDB.WriteCompleted.{SiteDBWriteTrigger}, otherwise writes are being lost.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.TabRevisitTracker.TimeToClose2
histogram.summary: Logged everytime a background tab is closed. Records the time in seconds that the tab has spent in the background since it was last active.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.TabRevisitTracker.TimeToRevisit2
histogram.summary: Logged everytime a background tab is revisited. Records the time in seconds that the tab has spent in the background since it was last active.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.UserTuning.BatterySaverModeEnabledPercent
histogram.summary: Recorded every UMA upload, this histogram represents the percentage of the interval since the last upload that was spent with Battery Saver enabled.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.UserTuning.EfficiencyMode
histogram.summary:
Logged on each UMA upload to represent which user-controllable Efficiency Mode setting the browser is in during the reported window. If the mode was changed between uploads, MIXED will be reported for that interval.
This histogram is used internally to filter other histograms by efficiency mode.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.UserTuning.MemorySaverModeEnabledPercent
histogram.summary: Recorded every UMA upload, this histogram represents the percentage of the interval since the last upload that was spent with Memory Saver enabled.
